trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Nixa
There were no other sightings in Nixa on or around December 16th 2009
divs: sighting details as i was leaving out the front door of work, i saw 3 brights lights of equal distance in a row heading south west. it was a very clear night in south west missouri, so observing many commercial flights at the same time made it easy to see in my mind a clear differance. these lights did blink but only one flash at a time. all three had there own flash and all kept the same pace when it came to their intervals. the distance to each other stayed the same while observing 2 to 3 minutes untill they move past the horizon. there were at least 4 jets passing at the time and their blinking lights had that double red\white flash that i always see. i first i thought maybe helecopters becuase my first impression was that they were much closer to the ground than the jets. but i heard no sound and they were moving much more rapidly than i would expect. a co-worker observed this event also.
Summary: Set of 3 lights of equal distance in a row heading South West.
